photoURL.description: The URL of the user's profile picture.

type.description: The type of document, if it's not an exam subject.

fileURL.description: The URL of the document file.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the document was created.

post.title: Post
post.description: An article or news post for the student feed or main news.

content.description: The main content of the post in Markdown format.

imageURL.description: The URL of an image for the post.

association.description: The association the post belongs to (e.g., cjm, ajp, amicale). If empty, it's a general news post.

authorId.description: The UID of the user who created the post.

authorPhotoURL.description: The URL of the author's profile picture.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the post was created.

alumnusPortrait.title: Alumnus Portrait
alumnusPortrait.description: A featured alumnus of the school, for the portraits section.

name.description: The full name of the alumnus.

promotion.description: The graduation year and field of study (e.g., '2005 - Génie Civil').

testimonial.description: A short quote or testimonial from the alumnus.

photoURL.description: The URL of the alumnus's portrait picture.

order.description: A number to control the display order.

schoolOfficial.title: School Official
schoolOfficial.description: A key member of the school's staff, like the headmaster or an admin member.

name.description: The full name of the official.

type.description: The type of official, e.g., 'headmaster' or 'administration'.

message.description: A welcome message or quote (primarily for the headmaster).

photoURL.description: The URL of the official's portrait picture.

order.description: A number to control the display order for admin members.

schoolPageSection.title: School Page Section
schoolPageSection.description: Content for a specific section of the 'Le Lycée' page.

content.description: Text content for the history section.

icon.description: Lucide icon name for a statistic (e.g., 'Users').

imageHint.description: AI hint for an infrastructure image.

order.description: A number to control the display order.

contactInfo.title: Contact Information
contactInfo.description: Stores contact details for the school.

address.description: The physical address of the school.

googleMapsEmbedUrl.description: The URL for the embedded Google Maps view. Should be the 'src' from a Google Maps embed iframe.

mentorshipRequest.title: Mentorship Request
mentorshipRequest.description: A request to become a mentor or find a mentor.

field.description: Area of expertise (for mentors) or interest (for mentees).

status.description: Status for a mentee (student or young graduate).

need.description: Description of the need for a mentee.

membershipApplication.title: Membership Application
membershipApplication.description: An application to join the alumni association.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public user profile information after they sign in.

/documents/{documentId}.description: Stores documents for the digital library. Contains exam subjects, courses, and exercises.

/posts/{postId}.description: Stores all posts. Can be general news (no association) or from a student association (cjm, ajp, amicale).

/alumniPortraits/{portraitId}.description: Stores featured alumni portraits for the Amicale page.

/schoolOfficials/{officialId}.description: Stores key personnel of the school. Use document ID 'headmaster' for the headmaster, and others for administration members.

/schoolPageContent/{contentId}.description: Stores dynamic content for the 'Le Lycée' page, such as history, stats, and infrastructure images. A document's ID corresponds to its section (e.g. 'history').

/contactInfo/{infoId}.description: Stores the main contact information for the site. Use document ID 'main' for the primary contact details.

/mentorshipRequests/{requestId}.description: Stores requests from users wanting to become mentors or find a mentor.

/membershipApplications/{applicationId}.description: Stores applications from alumni wishing to join the association.
